entry.title: My First Post Success
entry.content:
After around 20hrs+ I push my hexo page online success

At 2019 I try to deploy my personal blog on github page with hexo SSG. I put around 10hrs+ to learn about it. I fail to push my local files online.

I give up and forget it.

In this time, I encourted the same sitution like 5 years ago, but we have ChatGpt now. I copy the error msg to chatgpt when I fail. But it doesnâ€™t work for me. Because I donâ€™t really understand the git concept and contrl command.I try to deploy again and again that drive me crazy and angry. I feel some frustrated but I keep going.
But the advantage I understand how github operate more and feel inteserting.
Trying to find some relate tutorial artical. Finally I meet Moon Jamâ€™s Blog , I try to follow it step by step and mark down the error msg then try to figure out what is it (this might call â€œdeBugâ€).

5 years ago at 2024, I did it eventually. And Iâ€™m here to begin my life recording.

The reason is what I try to finish those commitment by myself.

Beginning and the end.

In this try & error road, I feel frustrated disappointed. But I trust this is a progress, I try to accept the progress and believe it (Itâ€™s very important). The driving force is what I want. NOT what I â€œshouldâ€ suppose to.
So I try to using my broken english to record this true feeling in my life. And I love to keep going on this interesting road.

THANKYOU
